name: Purgatory Of the Golden Witch
description:
*************

Good morning. The Golden Witch is thrilled to battle with you again.

By now, you might've discovered the rules of this world, and believe victory is in your hands even before the story has begun.

However, there's still more to this world to uncover.

Reality can be cruel and cold. Are you prepared to consider all possible moves?

*************

"Putragory of the Golden Witch" is a fan forgery for the Visual Novel "Umineko No Naku Koro Ni" and contains spoilers for the entire series.

The project is currently in active development.

In the world after the Rokkenjima incident in October 4th 1986, the concept of forgeries is no longer unknown - different stories and variations claiming to tell the truth behind the events of that day are published and explored by those who seek the truth, or by those who search a mere escape from boredom.

While most forgeries don't worth a skim, one forgery gained the attention of Hachijo Ikuko, and she offers her partner, Hachijo Tohya, to read it along with her.

Story and script: Uminetta

Visual Novel adaption, editing: RevivedReplayer

Opening Video: https://twitter.com/nyattoland

FAQ

  • "Can I read it if I haven't finished Umineko?"

I would strongly reccomend to finish the entire series first before reading this forgery.

  • "Can I stream/live read it?"

Of course! You can even use the tag #UminekoPurgatory or tag me (Uminetta), I will be more than happy to see it!

  • "I found a bug/typo! Where can I report it?"

Feel free to send me a message via Twitter, or even here in itch! Thank you for your help!
